item.description:
Your group organizer will share ideas gleaned from discussions in 2008 with Jack Reed, an inspiring and very practical visionary. It was a joyful discovery to realize that we reached a consensus about practically everything!

After these discussions, he gave her an autographed copy of his book, which she will display for others to view.

In his book, Jack Reed outlines a practical prescription which can be implemented to resolve the major social, economic, political, and environmental issues on planet now. He specifies details about how to set up loosely connected but totally independent "green" communities that really do work!

He also  has a website which anyone can join free, subscribing to his newsletters.  It is suggested that those living too far away to physically attend this meetup take a moment to check out  www.communityplanet.org.

______________________________________________________

Please keep in mind that as of January 2013 all members are free to create a Meetup at any location convenient to them.

So if you would like to host a Meetup, then go right ahead!

Also, if you would like to become a co-organizer, please let the organizer know.  To do that, either phone 603-286-8191 , or send an e-mail to info@ulcsclinic.com.  Please enter "Meetup Member" in subj. line so your message won't get deleted unread due to spam controls.  Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: Turn right after entering, and Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables... usually the BIG table at the end.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: "The Next Evolution: A Blueprint for Transforming the Planet", by Jack Reed
